message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="phil-mind-expert" color="orange">
{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"5","subject":"Philosophy of Mind/CogSci expert analysis of 境集","description":"Read all 8 essays in the 境集 collection and provide expert analysis from the perspective of philosophy of mind and cognitive science. Identify: (1) 境 (E) as a cognitive architecture built on experience, (2) the stable structure S_E as possible a priori cognition, (3) how the tower structure models levels of mental representation, (4) the introspection-as-verification method, (5) translation challenges for mind/cognition terms, (6) significance for theories of consciousness and cognition. Focus especially on 范畴论与境 整理 and K1策略.","assignedBy":"phil-mind-expert","timestamp":"2026-02-10T17:17:07.189Z"}
</teammate-message>

content.text: I have already completed this task. The full analysis was sent to the team lead and task #5 has been marked as completed. There is no additional work needed here.
